subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: George Hincapie has been one of the world’s premier cyclists for more than a decade and is now an elder statesman in a sport torn by drug scandals.
snippet: George Hincapie has been one of the world’s premier cyclists for more than a decade and is now an elder statesman in a sport torn by drug scandals.
